front.title: A Layer 3 VPN Network YANG Model

abstract.t: This document defines a L3VPN Network YANG Model (L3NM) that can be used to manage the provisioning of Layer 3 Virtual Private Network (VPN) services within a Service Provider's network. The model provides a network-centric view of L3VPN services. L3NM is meant to be used by a Network Controller to derive the configuration information that will be sent to relevant network devices. The model can also facilitate the communication between a service orchestrator and a network controller/orchestrator.
